question: Q1. The hyperlink created by an anchor tag is applied to the text, image, or other HTML content.
Q2. An hyperlink comes with an underline and blue color text by default. State True Or False.
Q3. Select the attribute which is used in ‹a› tag for giving the source of page to which hyperlink is to be created.
Q4. The _____________ value for target attribute will open page in a new window.
Q5. Select the correct attribute of anchor tag for opening the hyperlinked page in a new tab.
